item.title: PvP Locking/mode command
item.dc:creator: @why_so_serious why so serious
item.description:
@why_so_serious wrote:

[font=verdana][size=14pt]Here’s code to lock pvp mode[/size][/font]

public void pvpLocker() { if(pvpmode = true) { sendQuest("@gre@ (On)", 15126); } else { if(pvpmode = false) { sendQuest("@red@ (Off)", 15126); }
[font=verdana][size=14pt]Pvp mode [on + off][/size][/font]

public void pvpLocked() { interfaceEffect = 17; clearQuestInterface(); sendFrame126("", 2494); sendFrame126("I want my PVP mode on.", 2495); sendFrame126("", 2496); sendFrame126("I want my PVP mode off.", 2497); sendFrame126("", 2498); sendQuestSomething(8143); sendFrame164(2492); flushOutStream(); }

Read full topic
